name: colony
description: Configure what you what's happenning on the Colony network you want to get notified about

options.name: user
options.description: Link and manage relation between your Discord username and your Colony.io accounts

options.name: add
options.description: Add a wallet adress you want to get notified about

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete one of the wallet addresses you chose to get notified about

options.name: address
options.description: Select the address you want to remove from your watch list

options.name: list
options.description: List the address in your watch list

options.name: subscription
options.description: Manage your personal notification preferences ( ie : turn on notification on all Colony activity )

options.name: add
options.description: Add a new event you want to subscribe to

options.name: colony
options.description: Select on which colony you want to get notify about

options.name: event
options.description: Select which event you want to get notify about

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove an event you  don't want to subscribe to anymore

options.name: colony
options.description: Select on which colony you want to STOP getting notified about

options.name: event
options.description: Select on which on which event you want to STOP getting notified about

options.name: list
options.description: List the events you choose to subscribe to
